definitions.definition: a sheet of information in the form of a table, graph, or diagram.
examples: a chart showing how much do-it-yourself costs compared with retail
synonyms: flow chart; graphic "check your ideal weight on the chart"

definitions.definition: a weekly listing of the current best-selling pop records.
a geographical map or plan, especially one used for navigation by sea or air.
a written record of information about a patient.
a map showing the positions of the planets at the time of someone's birth, from which astrologers are said to be able to deduce character or potential.
examples: noun: birth chart; plural noun: birth charts
the pilot found his craft taking a route he had not charted

definitions.definition: record the progress or development of.
examples: the poems chart his descent into madness
synonyms: represent; make a chart/diagram of "the changes were charted accurately"

definitions.definition: (of a record) enter the weekly music charts at a particular position.
examples: the record will probably chart at about No. 74
